row.process:
:INC JOBI.BS20_EXPORT_LOGDIR :SET &PROGRAM# = "&PROG_LC#" :SET &INIFILE# = "&PROGRAM#.ini" :SET &OPTIONS# = "&INIFILE#" :SET &BEA_BESCHREIBUNG# = 'Garantiefonds_Bearb' :SET &PROGRAMMTYPAUSL# = '66' :SET &BRIEFNUMMER# = '65' :SET &VALUTA_SWITCH# = '&VALUTA#' :SET &VALUTA_SHIFT# = '&VALUTA#' :SET &LOGFILE# = '&LOGDIR#/&BEA_BESCHREIBUNG#.log' :SET &OUTFILE# = '&WORKDIR#/&PROGRAM#_&TS#.out' :SET &INPUTFILE# = '&WORKDIR#/nb42p800_&TS#.out'
:INC JOBI.BS20_EXPORT_LOGDIR
! INI-FILE erstellen cat << __EOF__ |tee &RUNDIR#/&INIFILE# ANZAHL = &ANZAHL_VTR# TRACE = &TRACE# PROT_VTR_FILTER = &PROT_VTR_FILTER_BEA# PROT_MSG_TYPE = &PROT_MSG_TYPE_BEA# BESCHREIBUNG = &BEA_BESCHREIBUNG# BEARBEITER = &PROGRAMMTYPAUSL# LOGFILE = &LOGFILE# OUTFILE = &OUTFILE# INPUTFILE = &INPUTFILE# [BEARBEITER] COMMIT = &COMMIT# BRIEFE = &BRIEFE_CTV# BRIEFNUMMER = &BRIEFNUMMER# VALUTA = &VALUTA# VALUTA_SWITCH = &VALUTA_SWITCH# VALUTA_SHIFT = &VALUTA_SHIFT# __EOF__
:INC JOBI.STANDARDJOB
